text: Jonathan Francisco Lemos (born 25 August 1992), simply known as Jonathan, is a Brazilian footballer who plays as a right back for Coritiba, on loan from Água Santa. ==Club career== Born in Brasília, Distrito Federal, Jonathan finished his formation with hometown club Brasiliense. On 14 August 2010 he made his first team debut, starting in a 2–2 home draw against Guaratinguetá for the Série B championship. In 2013 Jonathan moved to Capivariano, after a brief stint at XV de Piracicaba. On 10 July 2013 he was loaned to Comercial- SP,Comercial anuncia lateral promissor para a Copa Paulista (Comercial announces promising full-back for Copa Paulista); Futebol Interior, 10 July 2013 appearing with the side in that year's Copa Paulista. In the 2014 summer Jonathan signed for Ponte Preta, but after failing to make an appearance for the side during the year, moved to Água Santa on 11 December.Ponte Preta anuncia empréstimos de Bruno Fuso, Jonathan, Renan, Ademir, Rossi e Rafael Ratão (Ponte Preta announces loans of Bruno Fuso, Jonathan, Renan, Ademir, Rossi and Rafael Ratão); Futebol Interior, 11 December 2014 On 19 May 2015 Jonathan joined Portuguesa, on loan until the end of the year.Portuguesa contrata pacotão com Victor Bolt, laterais Jonathan e Julinho e atacante Willen (Portuguesa signs pack with Victor Bolt, full-backs Jonathan and Julinho and forward Willen); Futebol Interior, 19 May 2015 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Brasília Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série B players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série C players Category:Brasiliense Futebol Clube players Category:Esporte Clube XV de Novembro (Piracicaba) players Category:Capivariano Futebol Clube players Category:Comercial Futebol Clube (Ribeirão Preto) players Category:Associação Atlética Ponte Preta players Category:Associação Portuguesa de Desportos players Category:Atlético Clube Goianiense players
title: Jonathan Francisco Lemos
